name: Hot Babes
description:
So, you've decided that you want to accommodate all the hotties.
Second thoughts?
If so, you are definitely in the right place! Because cats is what else we have here!

If you have some time, you can lend us a hand to organize the delights. Just take each one and place them on the grid right there.
And don't worry because they don't bite even if you turn them a little.

MAIN FEATURES:

- Girls
30 original hand-drawn cats for you to befriend, collect and organize.
-Hand designed levels.
The game comes with 80 hand-crafted levels that we hope will mess with your brain.
-Simple Controls
You can play just by clicking the left and right mouse buttons, which makes it very accessible to both newbies and veterans of any age.
- Relaxing music
Hot Babes has relaxing background music.
